attributes.action: Anyone who knocks a cat over has to by law stop and not drive off
attributes.additional_details:
Too many cats lose their lives and as an animal lover who had a cat for 16 years and sadly was found this morning by a lorry it broke our family apart while the driver drove off.
Surely there should be some respect for cats like there is dogs
attributes.background:
I think it should become a law that if a driver knocks a cat over they should stop.

A cat has more chance of surviving when been knocked over if the vehicle stopped

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/637301

We have also published the following related petition, which you might like to sign:

Athena’s Law: Introduce new requirements for drivers who hit a cat: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/633536
